customProperties.forgingConditions: Must be forged in absolute darkness.
customProperties.armorEffects: You have blindsight out to 60 feet and resistance to cold damage.
customProperties.weaponEffects: This weapon deals an additional 1d6 cold damage and creates a 5-foot radius of darkness on impact.
customProperties.additionalEffects: You can cast Darkness once per day without using a spell slot.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Must be forged in absolute darkness.
Armor Effects: You have blindsight out to 60 feet and resistance to cold damage.
Weapon Effects: This weapon deals an additional 1d6 cold damage and creates a 5-foot radius of darkness on impact.
Additional Effects: You can cast Darkness once per day without using a spell slot.
